author: Special Correspondent
text: A demonstration coordinated by Tamil Maanila Congress was carried out by farmers’ associations at Sirukalanji in Chennimalai Panchayat Union where agitating farmers were forcibly manhandled by the law-enforcing authorities to facilitate GAIL to lay pipelines four years back. In the backdrop of the dug up tunnel and pipeline left un removed from the spot, the demonstrators called upon the Central Government to prevail upon GAIL to desist from going ahead with its project. The demonstrators included those who were roughed up by the law-enforcing authorities on February 9, 2012, locals said.
title: TMC stages protest in Erode district against the project
